document.full_text: a charity album featuring hits from the likes of lady gaga, bob dylan and madonna has raised $5 million for the victims of the japanese earthquake and tsunami, the record labels involved said on wednesday.
document.title: "songs for japan" charity album raises $5 million
lines_and_colors: a charity album featuring hits from the likes of lady gaga, bob dylan and madonna has raised $5 million for the victims of the japanese earthquake and tsunami, the record labels involved said on wednesday.
